commit.message: Replace calls to Unsafe.putObject with Unsafe.putReference
Update a code comment referencing Unsafe.compareAndSetObject to reference Unsafe.compareAndSetReference instead
Use getAndSetReference instead of getAndSetObject in test/hotspot/jtreg/gc/shenandoah/compiler/TestUnsafeLoadStoreMergedHeapStableTests.java
Remove deprecated xxObject methods from jdk.internal.misc.Unsafe
